Article Title: Bihar: Nitish Kumar to take oath as CM for the record 10th time at Patna's Gandhi Maidan; PM Modi to attend the event
Article Text:
Nitish Kumar is set to take oath as CM for the tenth time (File photo)

Nitish Kumar To Take CM Oath For Record 10th Time At Patna's Gandhi Maidan, PM Modi To Attend

Hectic parley on ministerial berth

NEW DELHI: Patna is set to witness a major political show of strength on Thursday, with JD(U) chief Nitish Kumar scheduled to take oath as chief minister for a record 10th time at the historic Gandhi Maidan. He resigned on Wednesday as head of the outgoing NDA government.Governor Arif Mohammad Khan accepted his resignation on Wednesday and asked him to continue as caretaker CM until the new government is sworn in.Kumar was elected leader of the NDA legislature party earlier in the day during a meeting of newly elected MLAs of the alliance partners. The proposal was moved by JD(U) senior leader Vijay Choudhary and seconded by BJP leaders Samrat Choudhary and Vijay Sinha. MLAs of the LJP (RV), HAM and RLM also supported the proposal, JD(U) minister Shrawon Kumar said.Soon after his election as NDA leader, Kumar visited Raj Bhavan with senior alliance leaders, including Union minister Chirag Paswan, RLM chief Upendra Kushwaha and Uttar Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Keshav Prasad Maurya, to submit his resignation and stake claim to form the new government. He is expected to hand over a formal letter of support from all NDA constituents to the governor before the oath ceremony.Several top leaders of the NDA are expected to attend the event at Gandhi Maidan, including Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Union home minister Amit Shah, defence minister Rajnath Singh, Union minister Dharmendra Pradhan and chief ministers of various states.Consensus has also been reached among NDA partners on key positions. BJP‚Äôs Prem Kumar is likely to be the next Speaker of the assembly, while the post of Deputy Speaker is expected to go to the JD(U).Sources told news agency PTI the new Cabinet will feature five to six new faces from the two main constituents of the alliance, the BJP and the JD(U), along with representation for the smaller partners.LJP (RV) is likely to get three berths in the new Cabinet, while HAM and RLM are expected to receive one berth each. Up to 16 ministers from the BJP and 14 from the JD(U), including Nitish Kumar, are likely to be sworn in.From the JD(U) side, senior leaders such as Bijendra Prasad Yadav, Vijay Kumar Choudhary, Shrowan Kumar, Sunil Kumar, Lesi Singh, Sheila Mandal, Madan Sahni, Ratnesh Sada, Mohammad Zama Khan, Jayant Raj, Umesh Singh Kushwaha and Ashok Chowdhary are seen as strong contenders. Others in consideration include Rahul Kumar Singh, Sudhanshu Shekhar, Kaladhar Prasad Mandal and Panna Lal Singh Patel.BJP sources indicated that most ministers from the outgoing Cabinet will continue in their roles. These include Samrat Choudhary, Prem Kumar, Mangal Pandey, Vijay Kumar Sinha, Nitish Mishra, Renu Devi, Jibesh Kumar, Neeraj Kumar Singh, Janak Ram, Hari Sahni, Kedar Prasad Gupta, Surendra Mehta, Santosh Kumar Singh, Sunil Kumar and Motil Lal Prasad. The party is also weighing three new additions, including former IPS officer Anand Mishra, Rana Randhir, Gayatri Devi and Vijay Kumar Khemka.Nitish Kumar‚Äôs swearing-in today marks yet another turning point in Bihar politics as the NDA prepares to return to power with a fresh Cabinet and renewed equations among its partners.
Article Summary: Jd(u) chief nitish kumar scheduled to take oath as chief minister for a record 10th time. He resigned on wednesday as head of the outgoing nda government. Up to 16 ministers from the bjp and 14 from the jd(u), including kumar, are likely to be sworn in.

Article Title: LeBron James recognition of Shohei Ohtani‚Äôs NLCS game divides opinion among Dodgers fans
Article Text: Basketball icon LeBron James revealed on his podcast how his group chat exploded over Shohei Ohtani's incredible NLCS performance, striking out ten batters and hitting three home runs. This rare two-way dominance left even James, accustomed to seeing extraordinary feats, in awe. The moment sparked debate online, with some celebrating the LA sports crossover and others questioning James's authenticity.
Article Summary: Shohei ohtani struck out ten batters and hit three home runs in the nlcs. Lebron james revealed on his podcast how his group chat exploded over the performance. The moment sparked debate online, with some celebrating the la sports crossover and others questioning james's authenticity.

Article Title: Trey Benson injury update: Cardinals' coach weighs in on his recovery as the team experiences a losing streak
Article Text:
Trey Benson sustained a brutal knee injury.(Image via Getty Images)

Trey Benson‚Äôs return timeline remains unclear as he continues to focus on his recovery





More coverage on the NFL -





Trey Benson, the 23 year old Arizona Cardinals‚Äô star running back, replaced James Conner on the field after Conner sustained a season ending injury, at the starting of the new season of the league.While this had sparked hope among fans, Trey Benson unfortunately sustained a brutal knee injury at the match against the Seattle Seahawks, which the Arizona Cardinals ultimately lost. As the Arizona Cardinals struggle on the field, here is the latest injury update about Trey Benson.As the Arizona Cardinals gear up to face the Jacksonville Jaguars in Week 12 after losing brutally to the San Francisco 49ers, there are no confirmed reports on when Trey Benson will be returning to the field.As per reports, after Trey Benson sustained his brutal knee injury in Week 5, he was immediately placed on injured reserve and was expected to return to the field in Week 10.However, it has not happened yet and this has sparked concern among fans.A few days ago, the Arizona Cardinals‚Äô head coach, Jonathan Gannon, opened up about Trey Benson‚Äôs recovery.The Arizona Cardinals‚Äô head coach, Jonathan Gannon, said, ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs doing well‚Ä¶‚ÄùJonathan Gannon added, ‚ÄúTake it day by day there. He‚Äôs not gonna be out there today but he is doing better.What does close mean? I don‚Äôt know what close means. Take it day by day but he's doing well. He's progressing."As Trey Benson missed the game against the San Francisco 49ers over the weekend, this has become his sixth match that he has ended up missing due to his injury.At this point in time, the Arizona Cardinals‚Äô star player, Trey Benson, has remained silent about his brutal injury as he continues to focus on his recovery.The Arizona Cardinals are experiencing a pretty challenging time in the new season. The team has managed to win just three out of the ten matches played so far.While the Arizona Cardinals did win the first two consecutive matches of the new season, against the New Orleans Saints and the Carolina Panthers, it has since experienced a losing streak apart from winning against the Dallas Cowboys.This has sparked panic among fans as many await Trey Benson‚Äôs return to the field in Week 12, even though the team has not confirmed anything yet about his availability.
Article Summary: Trey benson, the arizona cardinals‚Äô star running back, sustained a brutal knee injury at the start of the new season. The 23-year-old replaced james conner on the field after conner sustained a season ending injury. There are no confirmed reports on when trey benson will be returning to the field.

Article Title: Travis Kelce is in awe as Taylor Swift leaves him speechless with her ‚Äúmagical‚Äù presence
Article Text:
Travis Kelce is celebrating Taylor Swift's guest appearance on his podcast, 'New Heights,' which Apple ranked as one of the top episodes of 2025. The episode, recorded before their engagement, shattered viewership records, surpassing even Kylie Kelce's previous mark. Swift shared personal insights, and Travis credits her 'magical' star power for the immense success, highlighting their significant cultural influence.

Taylor Swift Reveals Favorite Track, Talks Travis Kelce And New Album ‚ÄúThe Life Of A Showgirl‚Äù

Travis Kelce shares why Taylor Swift feels ‚Äúso magical‚Äù in their latest chapter together

Franchise Records, Sanders NFL Debut, Taco Domination and We‚Äôre Going ‚ÄúBelly Bucking‚Äù | EP 165

Travis Kelce is soaking in a major win and this time, it has nothing to do with the scoreboard. The Kansas City Chiefs star is celebrating his fianc√©e Taylor Swift after her guest appearance on New Heights was named one of Apple‚Äôs top podcast episodes of 2025. During the Nov. 19 episode of the show, Travis and his brother Jason Kelce reacted to the news with the same excitement usually reserved for playoff victories.Swift‚Äôs episode, recorded just weeks before the couple announced their engagement, didn‚Äôt just attract listeners, it reshaped the history of the podcast and highlighted the couple‚Äôs growing cultural impact. And for Travis, there was no hesitation in crediting his fianc√©e‚Äôs star power.As Jason proudly shared that Apple ranked Swift‚Äôs episode at No. 3 for the year, Travis jumped in to praise her for being ‚Äúso magical,‚Äù playfully acknowledging how her appearance drove massive engagement. The ranking puts Swift just behind two true-crime giants, a rare feat for a celebrity relationship episode in a crowded podcast landscape.Jason joked that other New Heights installments ‚Äúaren‚Äôt even coming close‚Äù to Swift‚Äôs Aug.13 appearance, a sentiment fans echoed online. One user wrote, ‚Äúthere is no podcast episode better than the Taylor episode,‚Äù reflecting the enthusiasm that followed Swift‚Äôs debut on what she affectionately calls her ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù podcast.Swift‚Äôs sit-down quickly became the most-watched episode in the show‚Äôs history, surpassing the previous record held by Jason‚Äôs wife, Kylie Kelce. Kylie responded with trademark humor, admitting she‚Äôs ‚Äúofficially no longer the record holder‚Äù and adding, ‚ÄúI welcome that whole heartedly. Let‚Äôs drop that sucker down.‚ÄùThe episode offered fans a rare, candid look into Swift‚Äôs life. She opened up about reclaiming her masters, her father‚Äôs recent heart surgery, her Eras Tour journey, and the beginnings of her romance with Travis. In a twist fit for a rom-com, Travis proposed right after they wrapped recording.For Swift, the episode was another chance to connect with fans. For Travis, it became a milestone, proof of how their partnership continues to captivate audiences far beyond the NFL.Also Read: ‚ÄúIts complete ruthlessness‚Äù: Taylor Swift's insiders say Buffalo‚Äôs behavior proved NFL road games are ‚Äòtoo toxic‚Äô for her
Article Summary: Travis kelce is celebrating taylor swift's guest appearance on his podcast, 'new heights' the episode, recorded before their engagement, shattered viewership records, surpassing even kylie kelce's previous mark. Swift shared personal insights, and travis credits her'magical' star power for the success.

Article Title: NBA trade rumors: Houston Rockets predicted to land $118 million Dallas Mavericks superstar in blockbuster move to improve title odds
Article Text:
Washington Wizards forward Corey Kispert (24) shoots outside against Houston Rockets guard Reed Sheppard (15) (Image via Imagn)

Houston Rockets

NBA Shocker: Lebron Linked To Betting Mafia, Jones Traded Inside Info

Why the Houston Rockets Are Being Linked to Kyrie Irving

Kyrie Irving (Image via USA Today)

The Proposed Trade Package

Proposed Trade Package

Team Receives Gives Up Houston Rockets Kyrie Irving



Fred VanVleet, Dorian Finney-Smith, 2029 first-round pick



Dallas Mavericks Fred VanVleet, Dorian Finney-Smith, 2029 first-round pick



Kyrie Irving





Revisiting the Durant-Irving Partnership

What Made the Duo Special

Why This Reunion Might Make Sense Now

Key Factors Houston Must Consider

Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo (Image via Getty)

Potential Benefits for the Houston Rockets

Potential Concerns

Will the Trade Actually Happen?

Thehave burst out to a strong 9-3 start, winning four of their last five games, but there‚Äôs still a noticeable gap in their backcourt. With Fred VanVleet sidelined for the entire 2025-26 season due to an ACL injury, Houston is operating without a true point guard - and that absence is shaping the conversation around the team‚Äôs long-term ceiling. Amen Thompson has stepped up admirably, yet the franchise ideally wants him back in his natural off-ball role, pushing the front office to explore creative options.That exploration has led to a surprising blockbuster trade idea: reuniting Kevin Durant with NBA champion Kyrie Irving. The concept, highlighted by CBS Sports‚Äô Sam Quinn, suggests Houston could take advantage of Dallas‚Äô uncertainty around Irving‚Äôs future while addressing its own need for a primary playmaker. With the Rockets already thriving without VanVleet and Dorian Finney-Smith yet to suit up, the proposal is gaining attention - especially with Irving expected to return later this season from his ACL setback.The Houston Rockets are navigating the season with Amen Thompson stepping into playmaking duties, but the organization ideally wants him back in his natural off-ball role. Meanwhile, VanVleet is expected to miss the entire 2025-26 season, leaving Houston without a veteran distributor.According to CBS Sports writer Sam Quinn, Kyrie Irving stands out as a surprisingly logical target given the Rockets‚Äô roster construction and timeline. As Quinn wrote last Thursday, ‚ÄúIrving‚Äôs trade value is a total mystery. There‚Äôs really only one team that makes sense, and that‚Äôs Houston, where he could reunite with Kevin Durant.‚Äù (H/t: Sporting News)Irving is currently recovering from a torn ACL but is projected to return later this season - unlike VanVleet. Even with the risk, the potential reward of pairing Irving with Durant again is enough to generate intrigue for the surging Western Conference team.Here is the structure of the hypothetical deal outlined by Quinn, which brings significant star power to the Houston Rockets without heavy disruption to their rotation:Quinn notes that the Houston Rockets ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt really miss‚Äù Finney-Smith in this scenario since the veteran forward has yet to debut for Houston this year.Kevin Durant and Kyrie Irving shared the court for 2.5 seasons with the Brooklyn Nets. Although their tenure fell short of championship expectations, the duo delivered some of the most electric basketball of the early 2020s.‚Ä¢ Irving‚Äôs elite ball-handling and shot-making‚Ä¢ Durant‚Äôs effortless scoring from all three levels‚Ä¢ Their ability to take over games individually or interchangeably‚Ä¢ Ratings-friendly, highlight-heavy playstyleThe Nets didn‚Äôt capture a title or even reach the Finals during their run, but few duos matched their entertainment value or scoring chemistry.‚Ä¢ The Rockets are winning without a true point guard‚Ä¢ VanVleet is sidelined all season‚Ä¢ Irving is expected to return before the playoffs‚Ä¢ Durant benefits from high-level shot creation next to him‚Ä¢ The Western Conference race is tightening, making veteran experience valuableIf Houston continues its strong play deep into the season, taking a calculated swing on Irving could elevate the team into legitimate contender territory.‚Ä¢ Irving‚Äôs health following ACL recovery‚Ä¢ Contract commitment (three years remaining, $118 million)‚Ä¢ Team chemistry with a young core‚Ä¢ Fit alongside Durant in a new system‚Ä¢ Long-term flexibility versus short-term upside‚Ä¢ A true point guard with elite scoring ability‚Ä¢ A proven playoff performer when healthy‚Ä¢ Immediate pressure relieved from Amen Thompson‚Ä¢ Championship-level tandem with Durant‚Ä¢ Availability issues‚Ä¢ Contract size‚Ä¢ Risk of disrupting team rhythm‚Ä¢ Defensive liabilities in certain matchupsEverything hinges on timing. If Houston maintains its momentum and Irving nears a healthy return, the franchise may find it worthwhile to ‚Äúgive the former Cleveland Cavaliers star a look on the trade market,‚Äù as the original article suggests.For now, the rumor exists as an intriguing hypothetical - one that connects an overachieving young team with two aging superstars who once formed one of the league‚Äôs must-watch duos.Also read: NBA trade rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could sign $54 million Dallas Mavericks superstar to for deadly duo with Luka Doncic And as Sam Quinn emphasized, ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre not going to trade Irving just to trade him. They‚Äôd have to get something of substance.‚Äù Whether Houston decides to be that team will be one of the season‚Äôs most fascinating subplots.
Article Summary: The houston rockets are off to a strong 9-3 start, winning four of their last five games. With fred vanvleet sidelined for the entire 2025-26 season due to an acl injury, houston is operating without a true point guard. Kevin durant and kyrie irving shared the court for 2.5 seasons with the brooklyn nets.

Article Title: Brady Tkachuk expected to return soon as Ottawa Senators captain aims for Thanksgiving
Article Text:
Brady Tkachuk (Image Via Twitter)

When will Brady Tkachuk be cleared to play again?

The comeback timeline of Brady Tkachuk is gradually becoming clearer, which makes the Ottawa Senators fans have a much better idea of their captain's possible return to the ring. After a long period of recovery steps and increasing his on-ice load, the 26-year-old seems to be nearing an important change in his situation. His rehabilitation, which has incorporated skating, sessions, and doctor visits, has been positive and is now crossing over to a more promising stage.The most recent news came out of the Wingmen podcast, released on Wednesday, where Tkachuk said that he is aiming for a return around the Thanksgiving holiday in the US. This is in accordance with Postmedia‚Äôs Bruce Garrioch, who mentioned earlier in the week that Tkachuk had gone to New York to see a hand specialist to get permission to increase the level of his activities. The seven-game road trip ahead of Ottawa puts more pressure on his schedule, with the games against the Vegas Golden Knights and St. Louis Blues falling right in the period he hopes to be back on the ice.Brady Tkachuk has not played 16 games since he had the surgery to fix a torn thumb ligament on October 16, an injury that was expected to take 6-8 weeks to heal.He mentioned in the podcast that there will be another doctor‚Äôs appointment in the next few days, and he is hoping to be declared ‚Äúall clear‚Äù so he can start his full-intensity competition again. Before the injury, he had three assists in three games, having come from a 55-point season in 2024-25. At present, in his seventh NHL season, he has in total 191 goals and 407 points in 515 games, proving once again that he is one of the cornerstones of Ottawa‚Äôs roster.The Senators are currently in the fifth position of the Atlantic Division, but they are just three points behind Detroit, which is atop the division, so Tkachuk's expected return next week could extremely benefit the team in gaining momentum. If he is given the go-ahead as expected, his coming back may happen at the time when Ottawa needs its captain the most.Also Read: NHL Rumors: Insider reveals money tension rising in Matthew Knies deal as Maple Leafs struggle with cap space
Article Summary: Brady tkachuk has not played 16 games since he had the surgery to fix a torn thumb ligament. The 26-year-old seems to be nearing an important change in his situation. His rehabilitation, which has incorporated skating, sessions, and doctor visits, is now crossing over to a more promising stage.

Article Title: Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs fianc√©e Jade Jones takes an international leap for Sabrina Carpenter
Article Text:
Tyrese Haliburton with Jade Jones (Image via Instagram)

Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs fiancee Jade Jones travels countries for Sabrina Carpenter

Jade Jones' Instagram story (Image via Instagram)

With Tyrese Haliburton gradually recovering from his ACL tear, his fiancee Jade Jones has been making the most of her time. From being proposed by the Indiana Pacers‚Äô star to going for concerts, Jade Jones is making the most of her time currently. Recently, Tyrese Haliburton‚Äôs fiancee Jade proved she is one of the biggest fans of Sabrina Carpenter . She flew across countries to catch the Grammy winner‚Äôs glimpse.Jade Jones is a self confessed fan of the Looking At Me singer and traveled from one country to another to catch her glimpse. Sabrina Carpenter‚Äôs music career exploded with her 2024 single Espresso. She is currently performing at Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles with her first of the six sold out shows in the downtown arena.As Indiana Pacers‚Äô star Tyrese Haliburton is making the most of his time away from the basketball court, but his fiancee Jade Jones is ticking off her bucket list. According to a picture posted by Jones on her Instagram story, she was present at Sabrina Carpenter‚Äôs recent concert in Cypto.com Arena in Los Angeles. Jade Jones captioned the snap as,‚ÄúYes I flew across the country for Sabrina.‚ÄùThe NBA star Tyrese Haliburton proposed to his long time girlfriend Jade Jones. Despite being on crutches support, he went on his knees for the moment and captioned it as,‚ÄúThe place where our story started, and where our next chapter begins‚ù§Ô∏èüíç‚ÄùAccording to the reputed media outlet, Tyrese Hailbuton and fiancee Jade Jones came across each other at Iowa University and the rest is history. They both began dating in 2019 and adopted a dog named Ames the next year. Tyrese Haliburton proposed one month after tearing his Achilles in the Game 7 of the 2025 NBA Finals, when the Indiana Pacers lost to the Oklahoma City Thunder. Despite all ups and downs in Tyrese‚Äôs life, his fiancee Jade Jones has stood by him like a rock in one of the most difficult times. The Pacers' star was only an inch closer to live the biggest dream of his life, but due to the ACL tear they lost to the Oklahoma City Thunder during the 2024-25 NBA Championship.Also Read: Indiana Pacers' star Tyrese Haliburton and fianc√©e Jade Jones steal Halloween spotlight with impeccable Fantastic Four costumes

Article Title: Shemar Stewart‚Äôs girlfriend Grace Uribe sweats it out at Orangetheory Fitness Newport alongside Cincinnati Bengals WAGs
Article Text:
(Image 1 via Getty: Shemar Stewart, Image 2 via Instagram: Grace Uribe)

Shemar Stewart is currently the lowest-graded rookie in the 2025 class on Pro Football Focus

More coverage on Cincinnati Bengals:

NFL WAGs know how to make the most of their time together. Some throw lively parties, others organize fun celebrations, and a few even break a sweat side by side. That‚Äôs exactly what Grace Uribe, girlfriend of Cincinnati Bengals rookie defensive end Shemar Stewart, did recently. She joined fellow Bengals WAGs at Orangetheory Fitness Newport for a group workout session. Grace shared a reel from the fitness center on her Instagram, showing the WAGs in stylish workout gear, powering through cardio under sombre orange lights, and tackling the challenging battling ropes. Trainers kept a close eye on everyone, ensuring no one slacked off. After their intense session, the group posed for a radiant post-workout photo, their faces glowing with accomplishment. Once refreshed, they enjoyed hydrating drinks and protein snacks. While Grace is embracing her new role among the NFL WAGs, her boyfriend Shemar Stewart faces a tougher spotlight and is reportedly listed as a bust: NFL‚Äôs Worst 2025 First-Round Pick at edge rusher.Shemar Stewart entered the 2025 NFL season with high hopes after resolving a contract dispute, and many expected him to make a strong impact. But just three months into his rookie year, his season took a tough turn.He suffered an ankle injury in Week 2 against the Jacksonville Jaguars, which kept him out for four games and delayed his return until Week 7. In Week 9 against the Chicago Bears, a knee injury led the team to place him on injured reserve, and he is expected to be out until at least Week 15. In his five games, Stewart has recorded only six tackles and one quarterback hit. Russ Heltman of Sports Illustrated reports that Stewart currently has the lowest rookie grade in the 2025 class on Pro Football Focus, ranking last among 120 edge rushers with a 36.9 grade. Heltman notes that the Bengals are experiencing another season without a significant contribution from their first-round pick. This contrasts with the immediate impact made by wide receiver Ja‚ÄôMarr Chase and quarterback Joe Burrow; the only top Bengals picks to excel in their rookie seasons this decade.
Article Summary: Grace uribe joined fellow bengals wags at orangetheory fitness newport for a group workout session. Shemar stewart is currently the lowest-graded rookie in the 2025 class on pro football focus. He has recorded only six tackles and one quarterback hit in five games.

Article Title: LeBron James set to draft NBA history with league-record 23rd season debut against Utah Jazz
Article Text:
Image via Getty

NBA Shocker: Lebron Linked To Betting Mafia, Jones Traded Inside Info

LeBron James becomes first player in NBA history to enter 23rd season

Also Read:

NBA Legend LeBron James is returning to the court. This is one of the best news in recent times for the Los Angeles Lakers fans. LeBron will be appearing on the court against the Utah Jazz. He has missed the first 14 games of the season due to a nerve issue. However, the legend‚Äôs appearance is not the only highlight of the game tonight. As LeBron returns to the court, he will be the first player in the NBA history to have entered the 23rd season. This means that another career highlight awaits the veteran.Shams Charania was one of the first to start the discussion on LeBron James‚Äô return to the court. While talking to ESPN‚Äôs Malika Andrews, the NBA reporter talked about how sources have informed him about the legend‚Äôs probable return to the court. Shams was informed that LeBron would go through his routine on a game day before he checked his final boxes of approval for the appearance. However, later in the day, Shams issued a statement on X that he firmly believed that LeBron would be making his 23rd debut against the Jazz team.LeBron James‚Äô career is nothing less than a book of records and highlights. The NBA legend is stepping up for another career highlight. As he prepares to return for the Los Angeles Lakers‚Äô 15th game of the season, LeBron will become the first player in NBA history to have entered the 23rd season.No other player has gone so far yet. The information was confirmed by NBA reporters Shams Charania and Dave McMenamin. Both reporters resorted to their respective X and talked about it.Shams wrote, ‚ÄúLeBron James will make his Los Angeles Lakers season debut against the Utah Jazz tonight at home, sources tell me and @mcten [David McMenamin].‚Äù He further continued, ‚ÄúThe four-time NBA champion has rehabbed a nerve issue on his right side and now will take the court for a league-record 23rd season.‚ÄùJames was out of the first 14 games. Before the season kicked off, it was announced that the player was diagnosed with Sciatica. It is a chronic pain condition that is caused by pressure on the Sciatic nerve. It runs from the lower back down through the legs. After rehabbing the issue, LeBron was back to practice with the team on Monday. All that the fans await is for the player to make his historic comeback now and make his 23rd season debut.
Article Summary: Lebron james will make his los angeles lakers season debut against the utah jazz. He has missed the first 14 games of the season due to a nerve issue. As lebron returns to the court, he will be the first player in the nba history to have entered the 23rd season.

Article Title: Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce shares a heartfelt message for her country as Jamaica recovers from Hurricane
Article Text:
Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce (via Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce/Instagram)

Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce supports Jamaica after the destructive Hurricane Melissa



Jamaican sprinting icon Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce has once again shown her patriotism for her country. The legendary sprinter recently attended Jamaica‚Äôs FIFA World Cup qualifier against Curacao at Independence Park in Kingston. The match carried extra emotional weight, as it was one of the first major events hosted in the nation after Hurricane Melissa caused widespread destruction. Fraser-Pryce joined thousands of supporters to lift the spirits of Jamaicans during a challenging period.The eight-time Olympic medalist shared a video from the National Stadium on her Instagram story. She captioned it, ‚ÄúForever and ever. One Jamaica.‚ÄùThe veteran athlete has been actively involved in relief efforts following the hurricane, making her support during the game even more meaningful for the nation.Shelly-Ann Fraser-Pryce has been using her platform to help Jamaica recover from Hurricane Melissa. She previously posted updates on her relief work, revealing how difficult the situation still is in some areas. She wrote, ‚ÄúThis week we made our way through the northern parts of the island with the support of Sergeant Travis Richards from the @jdfsoldier and his team. Being able to reach the harder-to-access communities has given us an even clearer picture of what people truly need.Water is still one of the greatest needs, along with a safe and comfortable place to sleep.‚Äù Her efforts reflect her deep commitment to her country beyond her participation in athletics.Notably, Fraser-Pryce announced her retirement earlier this year after a remarkable career. She began 2025 with a win at the Velocity Fest in Kingston, clocking 10.94 seconds in the 100m. She later helped Jamaica secure bronze in the women‚Äôs 4x100m relay at the World Athletics Relays in Guangzhou. At the Jamaican National Championships, she confirmed that the World Championships in Tokyo would be her last major event.In Tokyo, the 39-year-old competed in the women‚Äôs 100m and the 4x100m relay. Although she placed sixth in the 100m final, she stunned in the relay, playing a key role in Jamaica‚Äôs silver-medal finish behind Team USA. With eight Olympic medals and 17 World Championship medals, Fraser-Pryce has finished her career as one of the top sprinters.Her latest appearance at the World Cup qualifier proves that even after retiring, she still motivates and supports Jamaica, on the track, in the community, and now from the stands.Also Read: Olympics star Jordan Chiles reaches ‚ÄòDancing with the Stars‚Äô finale, calls out for votes ahead of grand showdown
Article Summary: Shelly-ann fraser-pryce attended jamaica's fifa world cup qualifier against curacao at independence park in kingston. The match was one of the first major events hosted in the nation after hurricane melissa caused widespread destruction. The eight-time olympic medalist shared a video from the national stadium on her instagram story.

Article Title: Will Connor McDavid play tonight against the Washington Capitals? Latest update on Edmonton Oilers star
Article Text:
Will Connor McDavid play tonight against the Washington Capitals? Latest update on Edmonton Oilers star (Credit: Getty Images)

Connor McDavid's Top 10 Career Highlights

Connor McDavid‚Äôs playing status for Washington Capitals vs Edmonton Oilers game



The Edmonton Oilers and Washington Capitals meet tonight in a highly anticipated clash at Capital One Arena. Along with attention centered on whether Edmonton Oilers star Connor McDavid will be available. The Oilers enter the matchup battling inconsistency and injuries. This is making McDavid‚Äôs presence even more crucial. As they attempt to regain momentum on the road.Washington, meanwhile, continues to rely on strong defensive structure. Despite missing key forward Pierre-Luc Dubois, who remains sidelined following abdominal and adductor surgery. Both teams are navigating lineup challenges. McDavid‚Äôs game-time status is a key storyline heading into this East‚ÄìWest showdown.As of the latest team updates, Connor McDavid is expected to play tonight. Article Title: The rise of Braeden Bowman: Undrafted rookie emerges as Golden Knights‚Äô new game-winning power play weapon
Article Text:
Braeden Bowman quietly rising as Vegas‚Äô next big asset (Image via: Getty Images)

Braeden Bowman‚Äôs rise adds crucial edge to Golden Knights‚Äô offensive setup



Rookie forward Braeden Bowman is rapidly becoming a story to watch in Vegas. In just his fourth NHL appearance, the 22-year-old delivered a crucial early goal against the New York Rangers, signalling a promising rise for the Golden Knights. His ability to read plays and react under pressure has given him an edge, especially on the power play, where he has already shown remarkable consistency.Bowman made his debut on November 13 against the Islanders and has since scored twice, both on the man advantage. Against Igor Shesterkin, he positioned himself perfectly to capitalise on a rebound after feeding Mitch Marner, one-timing the puck past the goaltender to put Vegas ahead. His previous goal in St. Louis also came on the power play, making him the fourth Golden Knight to score his first NHL goal on special teams. Impressively, his strike stood as a game-winner, making him just the fifth in franchise history to achieve this feat.Signed initially as an undrafted free agent, Bowman earned his AHL contract with Henderson in July 2024 before securing his entry-level deal with Vegas on March 3, 2025.His rapid progression reflects his strong work ethic and the Golden Knights‚Äô ability to develop young talent effectively. Bowman‚Äôs early chemistry with experienced players like Marner hints at valuable long-term potential. His quick adaptation to NHL pace has impressed coaches and strengthened his case for increased ice time.With two power-play goals in just four games, Bowman is emerging as a reliable offensive option, particularly in high-pressure situations. His awareness around the net and ability to execute rebounds are proving valuable for a Vegas team pushing for consistent scoring depth. If his form continues, he could become one of the most impactful rookies of the season.Bowman‚Äôs journey from undrafted talent to early standout shows promise for the Golden Knights‚Äô future. As his confidence builds and his role expands, Vegas may have uncovered a rising star ready to contribute when it matters most. If he continues developing at this pace, he could secure a key role for Vegas in the seasons ahead.Also Read: ‚ÄúProud of YOU and US‚Äù: Brittany Lucic shares appreciation post for Milan Lucic on overcoming challenges two years after 2023 Boston case
Article Summary: Braeden bowman has scored two power-play goals in four games for vegas. The 22-year-old is the fifth golden knight to score his first nhl goal on special teams. His rapid progression reflects his strong work ethic and the golden knights‚Äô ability to develop young talent effectively.

Article Title: Is Dayton Raiola‚Äôs decommitment from Nebraska a simple depth issue or a sign Dylan Raiola might leave?
Article Text:
Is Dayton Raiola‚Äôs decommitment from Nebraska a simple depth issue or a sign Dylan Raiola might leave? (Image Via Getty)

Dayton Raiola‚Äôs decommitment raises new questions about Dylan Raiola‚Äôs future at Nebraska

Dayton Raiola, a three-star quarterback from Georgia and the son of former Nebraska star Dominic Raiola, has stepped away from his long commitment to Nebraska. He made this move on Wednesday, just weeks before the 2026 signing period. His choice surprised many fans because he had been committed for more than a year and comes from a family deeply tied to the Nebraska football program.Dayton Raiola is also the younger brother of Nebraska quarterback Dylan Raiola and the nephew of offensive line coach Donovan Raiola. This family link made his commitment feel strong, so his decision to leave has raised new questions about what the Raiola family might be planning next.Dayton Raiola plays for Buford High School in Georgia, where he has led the team to an 11-0 record this season.He has completed 63% of his passes for 1,649 yards, 24 touchdowns, and only four interceptions, according to 247Sports.His only other reported offers are from Appalachian State and Charlotte. He shared his decommitment on Instagram on Wednesday, and the news spread quickly across Nebraska football circles.Right after the announcement, many fans wanted to know what this could mean for Dylan Raiola, who has been Nebraska‚Äôs starting quarterback since 2024.Dylan Raiola has thrown for 4,819 yards and 31 touchdowns in 22 starts. Nebraska is 13-9 with him under center, and he helped the team win its first bowl game in years.Dylan Raiola was having a big season under offensive coordinator Dana Holgorsen before he broke his fibula in the third quarter of a game against UCLA. He had surgery the next week and has been recovering.Some people wonder if Dayton Raiola decommitted because Dylan might consider a move once he is healthy.Dylan has transferred multiple times before college, and he also decommitted from Ohio State and Georgia before choosing Nebraska. Others believe Dayton simply saw too much quarterback depth at Nebraska.The room already includes Dylan Raiola, TJ Lateef, and Marcos Davila. Another top quarterback, Trae Taylor from Illinois, is also committed for 2027.Also Read: ‚ÄúA Healthy Amount Of Bullying‚Äù: Jonas Brothers Hilariously Tell Jason Kelce The Secret To Working With His Brother Travis Kelce Nebraska now has nine commits in the 2026 class, led by four-star cornerback Danny Odem and four-star tackle Claude Mpouma.The group also includes wide receivers Nalin Scott and Larry Miles, tight end Luke Sorensen, running back Jamal Rule, offensive linemen Hayden Ainsworth and Rex Waterman, and linebacker Jase Reynolds.
Article Summary: Dayton raiola, a three-star quarterback from georgia, decommitted from nebraska on wednesday. He is the son of former nebraska star dominic raiola and the nephew of offensive line coach donovan raiola. His choice surprised many fans because he had been committed for more than a year and comes from a family deeply tied to the nebraska football program.

Article Title: Toronto Maple Leafs under pressure as Matthew Knies' injury adds to concerns after Auston Matthews
Article Text:
Maple Leafs face pressure with key forward Matthew Knies out (Image via: Getty Images)

Maple Leafs lose Matthew Knies and Auston Matthews to injury, depth under pressure



The Toronto Maple Leafs are heading into a critical stretch of the season with mounting concerns, as another key forward joins the injury list. First, it was superstar Auston Matthews, and now Matthew Knies has been ruled day-to-day with a lower-body issue after missing Tuesday‚Äôs 3-2 overtime win against the St. Louis Blues. The timing couldn‚Äôt be worse, with Toronto already trying to regain form following their longest winless streak since April 2021.Knies had featured in all 19 games before the setback, recording five goals and ranking third on the team with 22 points. His consistency and early-season impact have made him a vital contributor to Toronto‚Äôs offensive structure. Losing both Knies and Matthews has raised serious questions about roster depth, especially as the team fights to build momentum despite injury disruptions.TSN Hockey Insider Chris Johnston confirmed that Knies now joins an expanding injury list also featuring Matthews, Nicolas Roy, Scott Laughton, Chris Tanev, Brandon Carlo, and goaltender Anthony Stolarz. Head coach Craig Berube acknowledged the growing concern but stressed the importance of a "next man up‚Äù mentality to keep the team competitive. His message comes at a time when Toronto needs immediate contributions from replacement players if they are to maintain their standing in the Eastern Conference.Despite the adversity, the Maple Leafs secured a much-needed breakthrough win, with William Nylander scoring the overtime winner to snap their five-game slump. However, the celebration was tempered by Knies‚Äô absence, which further highlights the urgency of his recovery. Toronto‚Äôs forward depth will be under scrutiny in the coming games, as the team seeks consistency without two of its most reliable performers.The Maple Leafs will keep a close watch on Knies‚Äô recovery as they look to prevent any early-season setback. A swift return would provide a major boost to their offensive balance, but for now, Toronto must push through November with grit and adaptability. With injuries mounting and pressure increasing, their response in the upcoming fixtures could define momentum heading into a crucial mid-season phase. Every game from this point forward will be vital in maintaining their playoff chances and stabilising team morale.Also Read: Matthew Schaefer turning heads in 2025 NHL season: Could he become the next Cale Makar?
Article Summary: Matthew knies has been ruled day-to-day with a lower-body issue. Knies had featured in all 19 games before the setback, recording five goals and ranking third on the team with 22 points. Toronto's forward depth will be under scrutiny in the coming games, as the team seeks consistency without two of its most reliable performers.

Article Title: Joe Burrow latest injury update: NFL Insider reveals Cincinnati Bengals quarterback may return by Thanksgiving to face the Ravens
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Joe Burrow)

‚ÄúLast week Joe Burrow told me he‚Äôs returning wayyyy sooner than was expected and gave me the timeline of ‚ÄòThanksgiving-ish.‚Äô Now, will start practicing on a limited basis. Absolutely unreal attack of rehab and response. At first, medical people didn‚Äôt believe he‚Äôd be back before the playoffs. Huggggge jump for him! He‚Äôs a G!‚Äù

‚ÄúFirst of all, Joe Burrow told me that 12 days ago, that would be two months ahead of schedule. Just absolutely ridiculous. So this week, Joe Burrow actually practiced. He just did 7-on-7. Yesterday he texted me saying, ‚ÄòFelt great. Let‚Äôs see how this week goes.‚Äô This week, they‚Äôre gonna move him up to do 11-on-11. And then they‚Äôre just gonna see how he progresses. But two months early? He‚Äôs a gangster!‚Äù

‚ÄúThe Bengals record in their last 16 games when Joe Burrow is starting: 7-1. Their record when someone that is not Joe Burrow is starting: 1-7.‚Äù

Joe Burrow was projected to miss at least three months

More coverage on Joe Burrow:

In just one whirlwind week, NFL Insider Jay Glazer‚Äôs updates on Joe Burrow have gone from shock and awe at his Thanksgiving-ish comeback timeline to marveling at Burrow‚Äôs leap into 7-on-7 drills and texting about feeling great. Now, Burrow is already gearing up for 11-on-11 action, leaving everyone stunned at his two-months-early progress. Glazer can barely keep up with Burrow‚Äôs relentless drive.So, Glazer goes from this:on November 11 to this:on November 16.Meanwhile, SleeperBengals recently released a tweet with not-so-shocking facts:At the beginning of the season, despite being known for slow starts, Burrow led the Cincinnati Bengals to a 2-0 start. Now they have gone 1-3 without him under Jake Browning, who was Burrow‚Äôs backup, and 1-4 under Joe Flacco, who was acquired from the Cleveland Browns.Back in September, when Burrow had missed two of four games, Mike Moraitis of The Sporting News shared an injury update. Burrow had a serious case of turf toe, a Grade 3 issue that required surgery and a long absence from the field. NFL Insider Ian Rapoport then reported that the 28-year-old quarterback would miss at least three months.‚ÄúThey‚Äôre saying three months, I don‚Äôt see three months being an actual timeline,‚Äù Glazer said in September via The Sporting News. ‚ÄúI think more or so (Burrow has) a chance (to return) if they make the playoffs, but only because it‚Äôs Burrow. Somebody else, I‚Äôd say no. But he has a Mamba Mentality, maybe yes. It‚Äôs such a difficult injury to return from.‚ÄùCut to the present: Glazer is thrilled to announce that Burrow may return two months earlier than expected! To supposedly face the Baltimore Ravens.
Article Summary: Joe burrow was projected to miss at least three months with turf toe. Nfl insider jay glazer is thrilled to announce that burrow may return two months earlier than expected. The bengals have gone 1-3 without him under jake browning and 1-4 under joe flacco.

Article Title: Former Falcons star Matt Ryan returns to NFL spotlight after hanging up his cleats, joins CBS booth for Christmas Gameday broadcast
Article Text:
Matt Ryan back in NFL action.

Matt Ryans Top 10 Career Plays | Atlanta Falcons

Matt Ryan set for NFL Christmas Day broadcast

More NFL coverage

Even though Matt Ryan hung up his cleats last year, the former Atlanta Falcons quarterback hasn‚Äôt exactly disappeared from football fans‚Äô view. The 40-year-old has been everywhere, analyzing film and breaking down storylines on CBS‚Äôs pregame desk, joining a podcast with ex-Rams star Aaron Donald and longtime Atlanta reporter Zach Klein, and giving his unique insight into the league.Ryan‚Äôs connection to the Falcons remains strong. During the 2024 season, he mentored Michael Penix Jr., guiding the rookie through his first year as the team‚Äôs starter. Even in retirement, Ryan is clearly invested in helping the next generation of quarterbacks thrive. Now, he‚Äôs stepping away from the pregame desk for a bit to join the NFL Christmas Gameday broadcast, giving fans another reason to tune in over the holidays.The NFL recently unveiled its Christmas Day schedule, and Netflix is back in the mix for the second year in a row. The streaming platform will air the first two games of the holiday triple-header, starting with the Dallas Cowboys at the Washington Commanders at 1 p.m. ET, followed by the Detroit Lions at the Minnesota Vikings at 4:30 p.m. Matt Ryan will serve as a game analyst, joining CBS Sports‚Äô Ian Eagle and Nate Burleson in the booth for the Cowboys-Commanders matchup.This allows him to remain front and center in the NFL world while providing fans with his perspective as one of the most accomplished quarterbacks of the last 15 years.Despite still being in excellent shape, Ryan has made it clear that returning to play is not on his agenda. Ahead of the Week 8 game between the Cincinnati Bengals and New York Jets, he joked with sideline reporter Aditi Kinkhabwala about picking up tips from Joe Flacco, another 40-year-old quarterback still active in the league.Kinkhabwala passed along Flacco‚Äôs advice: ‚ÄúDrink more water.‚Äù The moment drew laughs on the broadcast, and some even speculated that teams might be curious about Ryan making a return. But he quickly ended the conversation. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm good,‚Äù he said, smiling as he shut the door on the idea.For now, Ryan is focused on sharing his knowledge from the broadcast booth, mentoring young quarterbacks, and keeping fans engaged with his expert analysis. While he‚Äôs no longer taking snaps on Sundays, Matt Ryan is still very much a visible, respected voice in the NFL, proving that retirement doesn‚Äôt mean stepping away from the game entirely.
Article Summary: Former atlanta falcons quarterback matt ryan will join the nfl christmas gameday broadcast. He will serve as a game analyst for the dallas cowboys-washington commanders game. The nfl recently unveiled its christmas day schedule, and netflix is back in the mix for the second year.

Kirill Kaprizov expected to lead Wild‚Äôs offense against Hurricanes (Image via: Getty Images)

Will Wild‚Äôs forward Kirill Kaprizov play against Hurricanes tonight?



The Kirill Kaprizov Saga Continues... | SDP

The Minnesota Wild face a key matchup against the Carolina Hurricanes, and Kirill Kaprizov is expected to play a central role. His scoring ability will be a crucial factor in Minnesota‚Äôs strategy on Wednesday night.Through 20 games, Kaprizov has recorded 23 points, including six multi-point performances, and has scored in 10 contests, with one multi-goal game. His offensive consistency, both at even strength and on the power play, makes him a central figure in the Wild‚Äôs scoring plans, particularly in high-pressure situations.The Wild is expected to have Kirill Kaprizov on the ice for Wednesday‚Äôs game. Kaprizov has tallied 11 goals on 70 shots this season, converting 15.7% of his attempts. On the power play, he has scored six goals from 24 shots, highlighting his efficiency in man-advantage situations. Against Carolina earlier this season, he recorded two shots but did not score, adding tactical interest to this matchup.Minnesota‚Äôs offensive approach will rely heavily on Kaprizov‚Äôs positioning, quick release, and ability to read defensive coverage.His proficiency in creating scoring opportunities and finishing plays makes him the team‚Äôs primary scoring threat. Kaprizov‚Äôs vision on the ice allows him to exploit gaps in coverage, set up teammates, and generate high-danger chances, particularly in tight-checking situations. Additionally, Kaprizov‚Äôs ability to perform on the power play adds another layer of threat, as his efficiency in man-advantage scenarios can swing momentum and create key scoring opportunities at crucial moments.The Minnesota Wild will play the Carolina Hurricanes on Wednesday, November 19, 2025, with puck drop at 9:30 PM ET at Grand Casino Arena in Saint Paul, Minnesota.
